data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
In the minute 4, Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Tigres.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Mazatlan are pushing forward but Martin Rodriguez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 8, Tigres have a goal kick.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
In the minute 10, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mazatlan.
Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Mazatlan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tigres.
In the minute 15, Eduardo Vargas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tigres.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Tigres's half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Tigres.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
In the minute 24, In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Tigres's half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Tigres.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 31, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Tigres, close to Mazatlan's area.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Mazatlan close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Mazatlan.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 37, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Tigres in Mazatlan.
In the minute 39, Free kick Mazatlan.
Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 43, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Oscar Mejia Garcia has blown to start the second-half.
Luis Rodriguez is replacing Hugo Ayala for the away team.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Javier Aquino with Julian Quinones.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Mazatlan needs to be cautious. Tigres have an attacking throw-in.
Can Tigres capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mazatlan's half?
In the minute 50, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Martin Rodriguez of Mazatlan gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mazatlan.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, Tigres's Guido Pizarro misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Mazatlan.
In the minute 59, Play has been interrupted briefly in Mazatlan to check on Andre Pierre Gignac, who is grimacing with pain.
Andre Pierre Gignac is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 62, Tigres have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Tigres.
Attention is being given to Tigres’s Jesus Duenas and play has been suspended briefly.
Tigres’s Jesus Duenas is on his feet again at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 64, Francisco Palencia is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with Camilo Sanvezzo replacing Cesar Huerta.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 66, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Tigres's half.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
In the minute 67, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Tigres are coming forward and Luis Quinones gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Fernando Aristeguieta with Miguel Sansores. This is the second substitution made today by Francisco Palencia.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mazatlan needs to be cautious. Tigres have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 73, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In Mazatlan Tigres attack through Eduardo Vargas. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Andre Pierre Gignac scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Luis Quinones to set up the goal.
In the minute 78, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Tigres throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, The match at Estadio de Mazatlan has been interrupted briefly for a check on Carlos Salcedo, who is down injured.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Tigres's Carlos Salcedo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Mazatlan.
Tigres to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Tigres.
Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Free kick Tigres.
In the minute 87, Mazatlan's Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal has been booked in Mazatlan.
Rafael Carioca (Tigres) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Tigres have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan's Luis Mendoza gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Mazatlan. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Jesus Duenas for Tigres has been booked by Oscar Mejia Garcia and receives a first yellow card.
Tigres make their third substitution with Eduardo Tercero replacing Jesus Duenas.
Ricardo Ferretti (Tigres) is making a fourth substitution, with Raymundo Fulgencio replacing Luis Quinones.
Miguel Sansores grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio de Mazatlan.
